item.cloudertinker.giantsword.descriptio:
Swing with caution!
The Giant's Sword is cumbersome to wield, but its range and power are unparalleled.
item.cloudertinker.hard_shield.descripti:
The Knight's Bastion is a heavy shield that excels in both offense and defense,
boasting considerable defensive capabilities and impressive damage potential.
material.cloudertinker.carminite.flavor: Keep out of reach of children
material.cloudertinker.carminite.encyclo: The core energy substance of machinery in the Dark Tower, also an option for crafting tools.
material.cloudertinker.glavenus.encyclop: The opponent invites you to a mid-lane duel
material.cloudertinker.frostiron.flavor: Polar ice isn't as cold as this stuff
material.cloudertinker.frostiron.encyclo: This frost bomb possesses unique magic that reacts with iron, yielding this incredibly cold material
material.cloudertinker.compositesteeleaf: Bound hatred with nowhere to go
Chains imbued with evil nightmare power, can be extended and fixed via energy circuits
material.cloudertinker.glaze.flavor: This is a bit extreme, isn't it?
material.cloudertinker.glaze.encyclopedi: A fragile artwork melted by high heat and then forged with extreme cold
material.cloudertinker.magnet.encycloped: Magnetic Field Rotation: Ninety Thousand Horsepower! Hya!
material.cloudertinker.questiron.flavor: It's a magic goat, we're saved!
material.cloudertinker.questiron.encyclo: Its texture and magical aura are constantly changing; the only constant is that goaty smell
material.cloudertinker.devilchain.flavor: Bound hatred with nowhere to go
material.cloudertinker.devilchain.encycl: Chains imbued with evil nightmare power, can be extended and fixed via energy circuits
material.cloudertinker.steelbone.encyclo: True to its name, 'bronze skin and iron bones'
material.cloudertinker.forestbone.encycl: Generally speaking, this is the difference between Strays and regular Skeletons
material.cloudertinker.castone.flavor: A hardy material weathered by the elements
material.cloudertinker.castone.encyclope: Perhaps the hardest thing you can find in this forest, though long-term weathering makes it not very secure
material.cloudertinker.forestwood.encycl: The cold, fine snow makes the wood's structure stronger... even if this connection is fragile
material.cloudertinker.chimera.encyclope: "Divine Aberration, a Desecration of Holy Principle"
material.cloudertinker.chimera.flavor: "Divine Aberration, a Desecration of Holy Principle"
material.cloudertinker.raven_feather.fla: Seen as an omen of misfortune
material.cloudertinker.raven_feather.enc: Ravens are quite spiritual, perhaps they understand the act of writing with feathers... You would use it to write, right?
material.cloudertinker.timering.flavor: Spring, Summer, Autumn, Winter; Day and Night
material.cloudertinker.timering.encyclop: They say 'Time is a butcher's knife.' But this is MC, after all
material.cloudertinker.orescore.flavor: What the... still gotta dig it myself
material.cloudertinker.orescore.encyclop: Fuses the essence of various ores, but still requires manual vein finding
material.cloudertinker.changeheart.flavo: Regarding the Twilight Forest invading the Overworld
material.cloudertinker.changeheart.encyc: Using the ability to transform the environment, we can better adapt to it or better compete for territory
material.cloudertinker.sorteye.encyclope: Although you can't see it, you understand what kind of creature is in front of you; perhaps this is the principle of classification
material.cloudertinker.red_thread.flavor: At least there's some magic aura on it
material.cloudertinker.red_thread.encycl: Thread found in the Minotaur's maze, looks... like red thread?
material.cloudertinker.nagascale.encyclo: The secret to this giant beast's swift movement lies in the incantations on its scales; now this power is ours
material.cloudertinker.steeleaf.flavor: Accel Synchro, but cannot Synchro Summon
material.cloudertinker.steeleaf.encyclop: When multiple leaves gather, they synchronize surrounding magical power to repair themselves, perhaps making this fragile material 'extremely hard'
material.cloudertinker.fiery.flavor: A red-hot branding iron isn't as hot as this
material.cloudertinker.fiery.encyclopedi: Whether it's Hydra blood or Twilight Ghast tears, both possess unique magic that reacts with iron, yielding this incredibly hot material
material.cloudertinker.knightmetal.encyc: Metal refined from the various scrap in Goblin Keeps; their former owners were knights, true, but its magical power is now only a faint trace
material.cloudertinker.colairon.encyclop: Can cheaply solve food and warmth problems
material.cloudertinker.colairon.flavor: Carbonated acid is still acid, it's reasonable to change metal properties, right?
material.cloudertinker.dectird.flavor: The power to command the dead
material.cloudertinker.prublaze.flavor: The Lich is still better at protection
material.cloudertinker.prublaze.encyclop: A strong flash can protect oneself, or blind others
material.cloudertinker.minogold.flavor: Magical enhancement makes it stronger than regular gold
material.cloudertinker.minogold.encyclop: Gold obtained through the Minotaur's special smelting techniques, used for standard equipment
material.cloudertinker.minodiamond.flavo: More durable and with stronger magic affinity!
material.cloudertinker.minodiamond.encyc: Diamond specially processed by the Minoshroom, only special individuals are qualified to use it
material.cloudertinker.hydra_scale.flavo: The scales harbor the Hydra's power, and desire!
material.cloudertinker.hydra_scale.encyc: Although the Hydra didn't leave any decent scales, we found a way to infuse its magic into other things
material.cloudertinker.phantom.flavor: Though the body is dead, still an honorable knight
material.cloudertinker.phantom.encyclope: Metal used to forge Phantom Knight armor; the touch feels like 'nothingness'
material.cloudertinker.fierdistear.flavo: A weeping soul, a crystal of regret
material.cloudertinker.fierdistear.encyc: Get closer and you might hear the unwilling wails of the Ur-Ghast
material.cloudertinker.arctic_fur.flavor: Wearing it inside out in summer is actually nice too
material.cloudertinker.arctic_fur.encycl: Smooth fur; perhaps the frost power it contains is more worth studying than its warmth
material.cloudertinker.alpha_fur.flavor: It can even be used instead of ice
material.cloudertinker.alpha_fur.encyclo: Superior and tough fur; even stroking the outside feels cold
material.cloudertinker.forestgem.flavor: Essence of the biting cold wind
material.cloudertinker.forestgem.encyclo: Using the residual aura of the Snow Queen's relics, extremely low temperatures, and the power of a magic barrier, we finally refined the essence of frost
material.cloudertinker.thorn_rose.flavor: Flower of life blooming in dead rock
material.cloudertinker.thorn_rose.encycl: These thorns, grown by magical power, are too strong and must be burned. But the flowers they bloom are just the right toughness
material.cloudertinker.giant_cobblestone: Since giants can use it to make tools, why can't we?
material.cloudertinker.mazeslime.encyclo: Slimes are everywhere; even the Minotaur's maze nurtures a unique slime
material.cloudertinker.steeleafalloy.fla: ...I have to admit, this is a bit too crazy
material.cloudertinker.steeleafalloy.enc: Rather than calling this an alloy, it's more like a pile of fragments catalyzed by magic
modifier.cloudertinker.twilight.descript: Mining speed +2 in the Twilight Forest dimension, Attack damage +2 in other dimensions
modifier.cloudertinker.twilight.flavor: "That faint light is the blessing of the Twilight Forest"
modifier.cloudertinker.precipitate.descr: Increases mining speed of melee tools based on health lost
When health <50%, increases Speed potion effect based on health lost
modifier.cloudertinker.synergy.descripti: Self-repairs when Steeleaf is in the hotbar
modifier.cloudertinker.stalwart.descript: 10% chance to gain Resistance for 10s after a successful critical hit on a mob with a melee tool
modifier.cloudertinker.superheat.descrip: Damage increased by 35% against burning enemies
modifier.cloudertinker.fire_react.descri: When hit, ignites attacker for 1 second per level; if already burning, reflects 5% damage as fire damage per level
modifier.cloudertinker.cuttinggirl.descr: Attacks have a chance to strike vitals, dealing extra magic damage and applying Weakness and Slowness, sometimes drops a portion of Chicken and Mushroom Stew
modifier.cloudertinker.cuttinggirl.flavo: "I'll chop your chicken off and make Chicken and Mushroom Stew!"
modifier.cloudertinker.lichcurse.descrip: 50% of your attack damage is converted to magic damage, your arrows deal an additional 20% of current health as magic damage
modifier.cloudertinker.lichcurse.flavor: The curses inscribed on the weapon gleam under the twilight's blessing
modifier.cloudertinker.lichprotect.descr: Immune to Weakness, Slowness, Poison, and Wither when health is above 50%
modifier.cloudertinker.lichprotect.flavo: The curses inscribed on the armor gleam under the twilight's blessing
modifier.cloudertinker.clousetodusk.desc: Arrows apply 'Curse of the Evil Mare' equal to the modifier level. Deals 3 wither damage per second per level and applies Slowness and Weakness of the same level for 1 second
modifier.cloudertinker.clousetoduskarmor: When hit, applies 'Curse of the Evil Mare' equal to the modifier level to attackers
modifier.cloudertinker.sacrificeblood.de: Right-click to cut yourself, gaining Strength. If already under Strength, increases level and duration. Initial health cost scales with Strength level; duration extension and health cost per use scale with modifier level
modifier.cloudertinker.sacrificeblood.fl: "Blood for the Emperor! Skulls for the Golden Throne!"
modifier.cloudertinker.drawblood.descrip: When hit, each level drains health from the attacker to heal you and applies Slowness III
modifier.cloudertinker.drawblood.flavor: Mostly the same as reducing damage taken
modifier.cloudertinker.fashionbody.descr:
Your attacks have a 10% chance to summon a loyal Zombie and apply Poison II for 5s. Each level increases summon chance by 10% and Poison level by 1;
Max 11 simultaneously in an area
modifier.cloudertinker.twilightprotece.d: Right-click to gain a shield similar to the Scepter and gain 1 minute of 'Shield Cooldown'. Only the 'Shield Scepter' can provide similar effects during this time
modifier.cloudertinker.prublazeshadow.de: Your arrows apply Blindness and grant you Speed, increasing its level. Each level of Speed on you and Blindness on the target increases damage by 10%
When hit, gain a shield similar to the Scepter and gain 5 minutes of 'Shield Cooldown'
Quite three-dimensional defense, without affecting mobility
modifier.cloudertinker.hydrabitten.descr: When saturation >6, deals extra fire damage and restores a little saturation; otherwise deals heavy damage and fills saturation
modifier.cloudertinker.hydrabitten.flavo: Look how hungry the kid is, starting to bite people
modifier.cloudertinker.hydrafire.descrip: Your arrows cause explosions. When saturation is not below 10, damage and explosion power increase with saturation (consuming saturation, priority to saturation) and create fire
modifier.cloudertinker.hydralife.descrip: When saturation >10 and health <=50%, rapidly consumes saturation to accelerate health regeneration, but grants Slowness and Weakness if saturation <10
modifier.cloudertinker.hydralife.flavor: So that's why the Hydra doesn't run
When hit, gain brief Strength. Full-power attacks grant Resistance up to level 3 for a short time. Excess modifier levels grant 5s Damage Absorption
Under the twilight's glow, you feel the knights' honor is with you
modifier.cloudertinker.breakphantom.desc: Attacking while invisible clears your invisibility, deals 2.5x damage, and reduces target's movement speed and armor; killing a mob with a direct attack grants 20s invisibility
modifier.cloudertinker.phantom.descripti: 25% chance to reduce damage taken by 25%. While invisible, consumes 30% of the remaining duration to double the chance and damage reduction amount
modifier.cloudertinker.phantom.flavor: Ethereal and elusive, following like a shadow
modifier.cloudertinker.resentment.flavor: When will the deep hatred be avenged? When can it be avenged!?
modifier.cloudertinker.relieveresentment:
While worn, melee damage increases based on Resentment stacks;
If the target has [Brand of Resentment], attempts to spread it to nearby mobs
You are all accomplices in this scheme!
modifier.cloudertinker.readyboom.descrip: When Resentment >100, your arrows consume Resentment to detonate [Brand of Resentment] within a 4-block radius of the target. Explosion radius 4
modifier.cloudertinker.readyboom.tooltip: Killer Queen has touched this arrow
modifier.cloudertinker.nodienoend.descri: Increases armor based on Resentment, up to 20 points
modifier.cloudertinker.chillaura.descrip: When hit, freezes your attacker. If already frozen, reflects 5% damage as frost damage per level
modifier.cloudertinker.chillaura.flavor: Let it go! Let it go!
modifier.cloudertinker.frosttought.flavo: "Like putting your hand down someone's collar in winter"
modifier.cloudertinker.frostcraft.descri: Accumulates Frost when not in main hand or equipped
modifier.cloudertinker.frostcraft.flavor: "Rome wasn't built in a day, and ice three feet thick isn't frozen in one"
modifier.cloudertinker.frostsword.descri: Attacks consume Frost, increasing damage and frost effects applied based on Frost stacks
modifier.cloudertinker.frostbomb.descrip: Arrows consume Frost, causing an icy explosion and applying frost effects based on Frost stacks and arrow base damage
modifier.cloudertinker.frostbomb.flavor: Can be used more than three times a day
modifier.cloudertinker.frostaround.descr: Randomly freezes nearby mobs. When hit, consumes Frost to freeze all nearby mobs and reduce damage taken
modifier.cloudertinker.differencebetween:
Damage increased by 25% and reduces armor if target is a 'monster';
Damage reduced by 75% and applies 'Regeneration' if target is an 'animal'
Mercy is only for those who deserve it
modifier.cloudertinker.habitat.descripti: Gain 'Saturation' and 'Resistance' when in a 'Magic Forest' biome
modifier.cloudertinker.habitat.flavor: Caused by long-term dwelling in past lives
modifier.cloudertinker.territorialstrugg:
Damage increased by 50% and reduces target movement speed;
If not in a 'Magic Forest' biome, also gain brief Weakness and Hunger
modifier.cloudertinker.timeflies.descrip: Gain Speed and Haste every second, 10% chance to clear all equipment cooldowns
modifier.cloudertinker.overlost.descript: Damage increased by 10% * target's Slowness level * modifier level. If target has no Slowness, consumes stacks to apply Slowness
modifier.cloudertinker.overlost.flavor: Going in circles back to the start
modifier.cloudertinker.overmygo.descript: Damage taken reduced by 10% * target's Slowness level. Gain Resistance equal to modifier level when under Slowness yourself
modifier.cloudertinker.overmygo.flavor: Even if lost, let's move forward together
modifier.cloudertinker.variablood.descri: Attack damage increased by 40%, deals 20% magic damage, and causes Bleeding debuff
modifier.cloudertinker.variabloodarmor.d: Blocking +1, Armor +3, Restores 3 saturation when hit
modifier.cloudertinker.unrestrainedsyste: While held/worn, immune to effects that can be cleared by milk
"Restraints are meaningless, the chains have long vanished"
modifier.cloudertinker.winderosion.descr: Gain 'Shattered Armor' when health below 75%. 'Shattered Armor' level increases as health decreases
modifier.cloudertinker.winderosion.flavo: Effects left by long-term exposure to wind and rain
modifier.cloudertinker.magicforce.descri: 75% damage reduction at full health. If damage exceeds remaining health, consumes Durability to reduce damage by an equal amount
modifier.cloudertinker.magicforce.flavor: Although borrowed, this forcefield is quite useful, isn't it?
Accumulate Sturdiness every 5s while standing still. Sturdiness decreases rapidly while moving. Sturdiness increases armor toughness
modifier.cloudertinker.frostcondense.des: Regenerate Frost per second. Directly killing a mob restores 30 * modifier level Frost to the tool
modifier.cloudertinker.steelbone.descrip: Attacks deal an additional 50% anvil crushing damage and reduce target's armor
modifier.cloudertinker.bonebullet.descri: Damage increased by 30% and applies [Bleeding] for 30 seconds
modifier.cloudertinker.bonebullet.flavor: It's only a matter of time before the target dies
modifier.cloudertinker.frostbone.descrip: Each point of Frost gives a 1% chance per level to consume 5 Frost on attack, dealing 3 frost damage and applying Slowness
modifier.cloudertinker.hatred.descriptio:
When hit, accumulate Resentment (max 100 stacks). Resentment decreases over time;
Accumulation and decay rates stack for multiple pieces
modifier.cloudertinker.chainspike.descri: 10% chance on melee attack to deal 5 wither damage and apply [Curse of the Evil Mare]. Chance increases by 5% per 10 Resentment
modifier.cloudertinker.chainspike.flavor: Wounds injured by evil nightmare power emanate an ominous aura
modifier.cloudertinker.brokenimpulse.des: If target has no [Curse of the Evil Mare] but has [Bleeding], consumes 20 Resentment to deal 5 wither damage and apply [Curse of the Evil Mare] equal to the [Bleeding] level
modifier.cloudertinker.magent.descriptio: Mining speed *1.5 for deepslate, stone, granite, etc.; Your attacks pull nearby entities towards you based on level
modifier.cloudertinker.fragile.descripti: Forces consumption of 100 durability per level when attacking or mining blocks
modifier.cloudertinker.forestquest.descr: Gradually repairs the tool when in the Twilight Forest dimension or a Magic Forest biome
modifier.cloudertinker.forestquest.flavo: This forest still holds many secrets
modifier.cloudertinker.crumblehorn.descr:
Attacks have a chance to deal extra sonic damage, reduce target armor, and apply Slowness;
Chance to deal extra piercing damage and apply Bleeding and Weakness
modifier.cloudertinker.questprotect.desc: Immune to and clears Blindness, Darkness, Mining Fatigue; grants Night Vision
modifier.cloudertinker.questprotect.flav: You can feel a mysterious power protecting you... accompanied by a goaty smell
modifier.cloudertinker.harmonize.descrip: Attacks deal magic damage based on the number of Steeleaf in the hotbar
modifier.cloudertinker.harmonize.flavor: You and your tool have become a community of fate desuwa!
modifier.cloudertinker.harmonizearmor.de: Gain beneficial effects based on the number of Steeleaf in the hotbar
modifier.cloudertinker.harmonizearmor.fl: You and your tool have become a community of fate desuwa!
modifier.cloudertinker.supercold.descrip: Damage increased by 35% against frosted enemies
modifier.cloudertinker.magalatyranny.des:
When attacking, if not under 'Frenzy Virus' effects, gain [Frenzy Virus]. When overcome, melee attacks deal an additional 25% wither damage.
[Frenzy Virus]: Halves healing received while active. Dealing damage builds overcome progress. If not overcome when effect ends, becomes Eroded
modifier.cloudertinker.antivirus.descrip:
Full-power attacks and arrow hits额外增加克服进度 per level.
[Frenzy Virus - Eroded]: Damage taken becomes 1.5x and healing received becomes 0.
[Frenzy Virus - Overcome]: Damage dealt becomes 1.4x
modifier.cloudertinker.heatsword.descrip:
Full-power attacks and being on fire accumulate Heat to increase attack power by up to 50% per level. Overheating ignites yourself, reduces armor, and deals up to 25% extra fire damage and burning effect.
Being on fire does not reduce Heat of the held tool
modifier.cloudertinker.highspirits.descr: When saturation is full, tool attack power and attack speed increased by 10% per level
modifier.cloudertinker.highspirits.flavo: The knife and the heat determine everything in cooking
modifier.cloudertinker.ravenfeather.desc: Increases draw speed and attack speed by 20% per level, but curses you with Bad Luck
modifier.cloudertinker.ravenfeather.flav: I feel it will curse you, it definitely will
modifier.cloudertinker.takerootarmor.des: When health not full,额外消耗耐久 for Regeneration. After standing still for a while, no额外消耗耐久 and enhanced regeneration
modifier.cloudertinker.takerootarmor.fla: Gathering the essence of heaven, earth, sun, and moon
modifier.cloudertinker.takeroot.descript: After standing still for a while, increases accuracy by 20% and initial velocity by 10% per level, but grants Slowness and Weakness
modifier.cloudertinker.takeroot.flavor: Gathering the essence of heaven, earth, sun, and moon
modifier.cloudertinker.absorb.descriptio: 5% of melee damage per level repairs durability of all your armor containing Ironwood. Healing effect is distributed equally
modifier.cloudertinker.absorb.flavor: People need face, trees need roots
modifier.cloudertinker.darkness.descript: When ambient light level is below 9, the tool's attack damage, mining speed or draw speed, and initial velocity increase as light level decreases.
modifier.cloudertinker.darkness.flavor: The Dark Tower's environment makes it fond of darkness.
modifier.cloudertinker.infect.descriptio: Applies Wither effect to the target, even undead mobs
modifier.cloudertinker.infect.flavor: Can a skeleton getting poisoned be called 'losing calcium'?
modifier.cloudertinker.darknessarmor.des: Grants you Resistance when ambient light level is below 9
modifier.cloudertinker.darknessarmor.fla: The Dark Tower's environment makes it fond of darkness
modifier.cloudertinker.twilightarmor.des: +1 Toughness per piece when in Twilight Forest, +1 Armor per piece in other dimensions
modifier.cloudertinker.twilightarmor.fla: That faint light is the blessing of the Twilight Forest
modifier.cloudertinker.react.description:
When hit, counterattacks, treated as an attack with this tool
无效 if both hands have this trait
modifier.cloudertinker.react.flavor: "Those who dare invade the great Wu's territory shall be struck down and shattered by Sheng!"
modifier.cloudertinker.growhedge.flavor: Be careful not to prick yourself
recipes.modifier.cloudertinker.growhedge: Requires level 3 Thorns as a prerequisite
modifier.cloudertinker.seekwind.descript: Arrows you shoot are replaced with homing arrows
modifier.cloudertinker.seekwind.flavor: He runs~ He chases~ He can't escape even with wings~
modifier.cloudertinker.druidseed.descrip:
Your direct attack damage heals and grants buffs to tamed mobs, Iron Golems, and other players;
Otherwise deals 20% extra magic damage and applies Poison
modifier.cloudertinker.druidseed.flavor: You've been empowered, now go die!
modifier.cloudertinker.zombietoba.descri: Zombies you summon are stronger and carry equipment; melee full-power attacks summon an additional zombie
modifier.cloudertinker.zombietoba.flavor: Now we're really forming a band for a lifetime (?)
recipes.modifier.cloudertinker.zombietob: Requires Corpse Crafting as a prerequisite
modifier.cloudertinker.posionspike.descr: Attack damage +1 and applies Poison/Weakness/Slowness, but sometimes also applies Poison to yourself
modifier.cloudertinker.posionspike.flavo: "This knife is coated with deadly poison! *Slurp~*"
modifier.cloudertinker.coalescence.descr: Gain Strength effect equal to Poison level +2 when poisoned
modifier.cloudertinker.coalescence.flavo: As the saying goes, medicine is three parts poison, fortune and misfortune depend on each other
modifier.cloudertinker.melody.flavor: "Lost in the maze, but we are all here"
modifier.cloudertinker.blockcold.flavor: The blizzard on the glacier can no longer stop you
modifier.cloudertinker.championhonor.fla: You have gained the recognition of the deceased knights and become an honorable knight
modifier.cloudertinker.mysteriousveil.fl: This place holds few secrets for you anymore, filling you with determination
modifier.cloudertinker.allscepters.flavo: What happens when the power of four scepters gathers? Now you know the answer
